title: Neqoxec
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| neqoxec 3 [![Neqoxec.png](/images/0/05/Neqoxec.png)](/File:Neqoxec.png) |                                                                                                                                |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                          | 21-44                                                                                                                          |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                              | 6                                                                                                                              |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                          | 183                                                                                                                            |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                 | 10                                                                                                                             |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                      | 4                                                                                                                              |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                | 12                                                                                                                             |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                          | 40                                                                                                                             |
| Attack1                                                                 | 15 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                              |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                 | [rPois+](/Poison "Poison") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                       | [Holy](/Holy "Holy") [Silver](/Silver "Silver")                                                                                |

| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                        | [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors")                                                                       |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                        | [Demonic](/Category:Demonic_holiness "Category:Demonic holiness")                                                              |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                    | [Medium](/Category:Medium_monsters "Category:Medium monsters")                                                                 |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                    | neqoxec, neqoxec                                                                                                               |
| Flags                                                                   | [Flying](/Flying "Flying")                                                                                                     |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A weirdly shaped demon, pulsing and shifting with mutagenic energies, its belly distended with the devoured brains of its victims.***“If thus mutation is influenced by natural selection, it implies, that any particular mutation must advance in a direction advantageous for the respective species, and, indeed, many examples of mutation known among fossil animals are apparently due to the advantage produced by the change. I must add here, however that probably not all mutations (in a palaeontological meaning) are due to natural selection, but that many do not imply an actual improvement.” -\_Proceedings of the American Philosophical Society\_, Volume XXV, no. 150. 1896. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

The **neqoxec** is a particularly dangerous tier-[3](/3 "3") [demon](/Demon "Demon"). Although it doesn't deal much damage directly, it will gladly [malmutate](/Malmutate "Malmutate") you and drain your [MP](/MP "MP"). They are found in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss") and [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium") (particularly in [Mnoleg](/Mnoleg "Mnoleg")'s domain), and can be summoned by other monsters with the [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon") spell.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                        |                                                      |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Malmutate](/Malmutate "Malmutate")    | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Brain Bite](/Brain_Bite "Brain Bite") | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Neqoxecs require a clear line of fire to mutate you, so keep other monsters or summoned allies in the way to block them.

  - If that isn't an option, neqoxecs also cannot [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"); a source of invisibility will provide at least some protection in a pinch.
  - Their Brain Bite doesn't require a line of fire, however. Casters should watch out.

- Fortunately, they're fragile and have few resistances. Take them out first whenever possible.

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), neqoxecs had [Brain Feed](/Brain_Feed "Brain Feed") instead of [Brain Bite](/Brain_Bite "Brain Bite").
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), neqoxecs had [Summon Minor Demon](/Summon_Minor_Demon "Summon Minor Demon").
html:
Neqoxec

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
neqoxec 3 
HP 21-44
HD 6
XP 183
Speed 10
AC 4
EV 12
Will 40
Attack1 15 (hit: plain)


Resistances rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Silver
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Medium
Type neqoxec, neqoxec
Flags
Flying
A weirdly shaped demon, pulsing and shifting with mutagenic energies, its belly distended with the devoured brains of its victims.

“If thus mutation is influenced by natural selection, it implies, that any particular mutation must advance in a direction advantageous for the respective species, and, indeed, many examples of mutation known among fossil animals are apparently due to the advantage produced by the change. I must add here, however that probably not all mutations (in a palaeontological meaning) are due to natural selection, but that many do not imply an actual improvement.”
-_Proceedings of the American Philosophical Society_, Volume XXV, no. 150.
1896.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

The neqoxec is a particularly dangerous tier-3 demon. Although it doesn't deal much damage directly, it will gladly malmutate you and drain your MP. They are found in the Abyss and Pandemonium (particularly in Mnoleg's domain), and can be summoned by other monsters with the Summon Demon spell.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Malmutate Magical flag
Slot2 Brain Bite Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Neqoxecs require a clear line of fire to mutate you, so keep other monsters or summoned allies in the way to block them.
    • If that isn't an option, neqoxecs also cannot see invisible; a source of invisibility will provide at least some protection in a pinch.
    • Their Brain Bite doesn't require a line of fire, however. Casters should watch out.
  • Fortunately, they're fragile and have few resistances. Take them out first whenever possible.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, neqoxecs had Brain Feed instead of Brain Bite.
  • Prior to 0.27, neqoxecs had Summon Minor Demon.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Neqoxec&oldid=78300"

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
The '''neqoxec''' is a particularly dangerous tier-[[3]] [[demon]]. Although it doesn't deal much damage directly, it will gladly [[malmutate]] you and drain your [[MP]]. They are found in [[the Abyss]] and [[Pandemonium]] (particularly in [[Mnoleg]]'s domain), and can be summoned by other monsters with the [[Summon Demon]] spell.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Neqoxecs require a clear line of fire to mutate you, so keep other monsters or summoned allies in the way to block them.
**If that isn't an option, neqoxecs also cannot [[see invisible]]; a source of invisibility will provide at least some protection in a pinch.
**Their Brain Bite doesn't require a line of fire, however. Casters should watch out.
*Fortunately, they're fragile and have few resistances. Take them out first whenever possible.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], neqoxecs had [[Brain Feed]] instead of [[Brain Bite]].
*Prior to [[0.27]], neqoxecs had [[Summon Minor Demon]].

[[Category:Demon]]
